choices: "Hello? I heard yelling", a celebrity knocks on the door
121.content:
It was the VMAs!! Your first time there we going to be great! You had front-row seats and backstage passes thanks to a radio contest. It was going to be a blast!

After the VMAs:
You didn't know what to think of what you just watched. But you didn't care because you were heading backstage to meet and greet all the celebrities that were there. When you headed backstage, there was like 300 people and only 50 of them were probably celebrities. You bowed your head knowing you might not even see a celebrity at all. But then you had the use the restroom, you asked the closest attendee and they pointed you to a long hall to your left. As you walked down what seemed like a mile long hallway, you finally saw a door that said Men's. What you didn't know is that you passed the restroom for regular people ages ago. You were about to enter the VIP restroom.

As you opened up the surprisingly heavy door unknowingly, Justin FREAKING Timberlake walked out of the restroom.

"Thanks man", Jstin said to you as you held the door still and he walked away

You couldn't believe it, you just saw a real celebrity face to face. You got excited and entered the restroom. Inside was a really surprising sight, it didn't even look like a restroom. It looked like a fancy, five star hotel restroom. The mirrors and sink were wide and clear. The floor was a beautiful marble tile. And the best part was that there was so much privacy here. The urinals were divided by 6 foot walls, and the toilet stalls weren't even stalls. They were rooms you had to open a door to get into each one. You gazed around a little bit too long before you ran to the urinal to unload. Once done, you came to wash your hands in the most perfect sink youve ever seen. As you were about to leave, you saw a smartphone lying down on the sink counter. "I better give this to the lost and found", you said to yourself. When you picked it up, the phone beeped and you looked at it, a text from...Baby? While you were looking at your fun, another celebrity had walked out of the toilet rooms. It was Robin Thicke, he was still wearing the black and white striped outfit he was just wearing a few minutes ago. He stretched then looked at you.

"HEY!!", he shouted furiously at you
"Me?", you said a little scared Robin yelled at you
"No....", he said sarcastically, "The sink. YES YOU!! HOW DARE YOU STEAL MY PHONE!!"
"What?", you said. Then you looked at the phone in your hand and sighed. "Oh...you must've misunderstood. See I was just abo---"
"ZIP IT!!", he snaps at you, "YOU LITTLE THIEF!! IM GOING TO SHOW YOU WHAT HAPPENS TO PEOPLE WHO STEAL FROM CELEBRITIES!!!"
RoBin heads up to you and snatches away the phone from your hand, he then uses his unwashed hand to grab your face, making fish lips and drags you into the toilet room he came from. Inside was very roomy, a deluxe toilet, a rack of supplies, and a bench for some reason. Robin then locks the door and turns to you...

133.content:
You are David Beckham's representative.

Your job is to basically tell the media what David has to say when he doesn't want to about anything at all. Today was one of the worst days for David, he just lost a game 20 to nothing. Which is basically impossible for this footballer star. And the paparazzis and press are pounding through doors trying to find out what happened. You walked down to the press to tell them that David was just feeling sick today so he wasnt at is best. But they werent satisfied with that lie, so you headed down to the shower/locker room to check up on David. He wasnt there, but his teammates said he got his own personal shower/locker room at the second bottom floor. You headed down again dully and knocked on the door with a star.

"Hey David, the press wants you to go talk to them", you hollered through the door

"Go away..", you heard David's weak shout

You knew David was in a dark palce right now, but for some reason, you kept trying to call him out.

"David...please come out! They dont care what I say, they care what YOU say"

"Go away. I'm still cleaning all the sweat on me. Give me 20 minutes", he replied

You knew how much David sweats during his games, but 20 miuntes was a little too much for him. So you just kept knocking and knocking, until finally David was tired of it. The door opened in your face and a sweaty, pissed off Beckham still in his uniform pulled you in.

David then threw you into the wall, and you fell to your knees. You now saw that he was actually sweating in almost every part of his body and he might need more than 20 minutes. You had to cover your nose from the rank smell.

"Look how much I'm sweating right now, and YOU want to pull me outside to go talk a bunch of critics", he said aggresively

"Well....David..", you hesitated

"You know what, why don't you go ahead and clean me up. And why the hell do you keep calling me David, I'm your boss, call me Mr. Beckham.", he started shouting

David then walked towards you and pulled off his shirt, his upper body was glistening in the light, especially his abs. He then approached you and held your face to the wall with his sweat-covered shirt.

"Ummpf! Davi--mr. Beckham! Please stop!", you yelled as he wiped his sweat all over your face.

"No", he continued somthering your face with his shirt, until it was almost dry. Your mouth was now sweaty and salty and you felt very humiliated. " That was actually really stress relieving", he said, "What else should I do to you?"

15121.content:
You are one of the new interns at the recording studio Republic Records and was to assist the band DNCE in their daily tasks. Usually it was coffee runs and getting their outfits, but today Joe requested you to perform a special task.
"Hey intern, can I trust you to do something for me?", the lead singer asked
"Yeah of course"
"Okay great, no one can know about this though. Just between you and me", he started whispering
You nodded your head in agreement
"Okay so here goes. Me and my brother Nick are having a competition to see who can sell more copies on our next album release. And part of that includes collaborating with other famous singers. So, I need you to sneak over to Nick's work place and take a copy of his album. Here's a flash drive and the address."
You nodded and took the items. You really didn't want to lose this job after only two weeks.

------

The next day, the first thing you did was drive over to Nick's recording studio. You snuck in easily and pretended to be an intern there. You finally found the studio and went in. There was a computer open so you plugged the flash drive in and went to work. Once you copied all the songs, you pulled it out and began to leave until you saw Nick standing at the doorway staring at you. You felt your heart stop.

"Well well well...looks like we have a spy here", Nick said as he walked towards you and snatched the flash drive from your hands before smashing it with his foot.
You stayed silent and still.
"Well...who sent you?", Nick asked calmly
"Umm...", you muttered
"Why don't you have a seat while you think, since I hope you know you're not about to leave", Nick said as you took a seat on the leather couch.
"Who sent you?" he repeated
"Umm no one", you decided to protect Joe, " I just wanted your album."
"That's BS. Now we can do this the hard way or you can just tell me who sent you to steal my album?"
"I already told you no one sent me", you lied to his face
"Okay hard way it is.", he said surprisingly calm

He stood up and locked the door and you knew you were in trouble. He then walked slowly towards you and got violent. You were so shocked with what was happening. Nick Jonas was sitting on your face.
